column2: this service here is amazing.  Seriously
column3: it came close to the service I received at Jean Georges in NY.  As each dish is brought out
column4: the servers explained what the dish is called and what they are made up of... no stuttering and no ums... swag.  We sat at the bar and after every other dish our plates were replaced with new ones
column5: water and wine was topped off
column6: I never had to look for my server.  The servers here are a well-oiled machine
column9: was a badass ninja warrior.  He executed this meal and paced it correctly.
